subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets made another low-key move Monday, acquiring Chin-Ling Hu, a shortstop with little major league experience who team officials hope can be their backup middle infielder.
snippet: The Mets made another low-key move Monday, acquiring Chin-Ling Hu, a shortstop with little major league experience who team officials hope can be their backup middle infielder.
